2024.title: 1 TRACE
2024.description: 1 TRACE is a web‑based open‑source intelligence (OSINT) and digital investigation platform launched in 2024, integrating SOCMINT, CYBINT, FININT, GEOINT, dark web monitoring, credential leak analysis, and visual graphing.

2024.title: AdvSecureNet
2024.description: AdvSecureNet is a PyTorch‑based open‑source toolkit for adversarial machine learning released in 2024, supporting multi‑GPU attacks/defenses, CLI/API usage, YAML config, and reproducible evaluation.

2024.title: LLMSecGuard (LLM Security Guard for Code)
2024.description: LLMSecGuard is an open‑source framework from May 2024 combining static code analysis and LLMs to generate more secure code and benchmark LLM output security.

2024.title: SafeLine
2024.description: SafeLine is an open‑source self‑hosted Web Application Firewall (WAF) introduced in Dec 2024 to protect web apps from common attacks.

2024.title: Trapster Community
2024.description: Trapster Community is a lightweight, low‑interaction honeypot platform released in late 2024, designed to detect internal network threats.

2024.title: FuzzyAI
2024.description: FuzzyAI, launched in Dec 2024, is an open‑source framework specializing in automated fuzzing of large language models for guardrail bypass and malicious prompt testing.
